original_text: It worked for the first wild animal and it used the authority of the first wild animal. It made all the people on earth worship the first wild animal. That first animal was the one that someone had hurt very much. It seemed that it would soon die but it had become well again.
korean_text: 그가 먼저 나온 짐승의 모든 권세를 그 앞에서 행하고 땅과 땅에 사는 자들을 처음 짐승에게 경배하게 하니 곧 죽게 되었던 상처가 나은 자니라

sentences.original_text: It worked for the first wild animal
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 첫 번째 들짐승을 위해 일했습니다

sentences.original_text: and it used the authority of the first wild animal
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 첫 번째 들짐승의 권위를 사용했습니다

sentences.original_text: It made all the people on earth
That first animal was the one
sentences.korean_translation: 그 첫 번째 들짐승은 바로 그것이었습니다

sentences.original_text: that someone had hurt very much
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가가 매우 심하게 상처 입힌 것

sentences.original_text: It seemed that it would soon die
but it had become well again
